quoteText: If you are a California resident and Syniverse (via the Website or our other Services) is collecting or disclosing your personal information for a business purpose, your rights under the CCPA are limited and do not include the right to access, the right to delete or other rights under the CCPA
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
